Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
Recipe
public class Recipe extends Object
Recipe object class, which contains methods that pertain to the Recipe object.
Author:
Collin Zhong

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(File file)
      Constructor class for a Recipe.
      Parameters:
      file - The file that the recipe's information is stored in.

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int id, String name, int difficulty, ArrayList<Integer> ingredients, ArrayList<Integer> steps)
      Constructor class for a Recipe, which takes all of its information as parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the recipe
      name - Name of the recipe
      difficulty - Difficulty of the recipe
      ingredients - Ingredients of the recipe
      steps - Steps of the recipe, in order
